headline: GTA Online
subtitle: REST ASSURED
content:
Sitting atop The Diamond is an oasis of Penthouse suite luxury. Let the comforting sound of today’s chips being locked behind reinforced concrete and heavyweight steel soothe you into deep and profitable sleep.

Personal bar, private spa, exclusive arcade games - this is the humble lifestyle you’ve always craved.

With a Master Penthouse you’ll become a member of The Diamond family, and the family business needs your attention…
